title: Episode 86: Words and Numbers Listener Special #2
itunes:title: Episode 86: Words and Numbers Listener Special #2
description:
In this episode, we’re answering listener questions. What’s going on with this scary, dystopian Chinese social credit system? What government agency would you get rid of? What happens when religious leaders (allowed to freely exercise their faith as enshrined in the First Amendment) don’t allow their followers the right of free speech (also enshrined in the First Amendment)? Join Antony Davies and James Harrigan as they answer these listener questions and more on this week’s second Listener Special episode of Words and Numbers.

Show Notes:

Foolishness of the Week

Texas legislator wants to require political speech

Pennsylvania legislator wants to ban political speech

Topic of the week: Listener questions
